name: Clinical Trials Matching Service
description: Deciding whether a clinical trial is right for you can be overwhelming. Through American Cancer Society (ACS) ACTS (Access to Clinical Trials and Services) ACS cancer information specialists can help you overcome the challenges of learning about and accessing clinical trials with the right resources by your side. By signing up for ACS ACTS you will: - Learn about clinical trials - Explore personalized clinical trial options - Connect with an American Cancer Society cancer information specialist

howToGetIt: If you are a person with cancer, supporting someone with cancer, or a healthcare team member, fill out the form below or call our 24/7 cancer helpline at 1‑800‑227‑2345 today. Regardless of location, learn more about clinical trials by calling our 24/7 cancer helpline at 1‑800‑227‑2345 or by downloading the ACS CARES app, which offers helpful tools and guidance for navigating your cancer journey with confidence.
